member.name: NMLVDISPINFOA
member.summary: Contains information about an LVN_GETDISPINFO or LVN_SETDISPINFO notification code. This structure is the same as the LV_DISPINFO structure, but has been renamed to fit standard naming conventions.

member.name: NMLVDISPINFOA.hdr
member.summary: structure that contains information about this notification code.

member.name: NMLVDISPINFOA.item
member.summary: structure that identifies the item or subitem. The structure either contains or receives information about the item. The mask member contains a set of bit flags that specify which item attributes are relevant. For more information on the available bit flags, see LVITEM.
